Job Position: Digital Marketer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a results-driven Digital Marketing &amp; Sales Executive to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate is a creative thinker with a passion for driving online engagement and proven experience in converting leads into paying customers.
	You will play a key role in building brand visibility, generating quality leads, and supporting revenue growth through innovative digital strategies and persuasive sales execution.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective digital marketing campaigns across social media, email, and web platforms.
	Manage paid ad campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads, etc.) to drive traffic and conversions.
	Create engaging content tailored to target audiences to boost brand awareness and sales.
	Analyze marketing performance metrics and adjust strategies for maximum ROI.
	Generate, qualify, and follow up on leads through digital channels.
	Collaborate with the sales team to convert leads into customers and meet revenue targets.
	Conduct competitor and market trend analysis to inform strategy.
	Maintain and grow client relationships through proactive engagement and follow-up.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	3+ years of experience in digital marketing, with exposure to sales or business development.
	Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, and social media advertising.
	Excellent communication, persuasion, and negotiation skills.
	Proficiency in tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and CRM systems.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.


Preferred Skills:


	Experience in B2B or service-based marketing.
	Content creation or graphic design skills (Canva, Adobe, etc.).
	Familiarity with marketing automation and email campaigns.


Compensation &amp; Benefits


	Competitive salary (N120,000 - N180,000 / Month) plus performance-based incentives.
	Career growth and continuous learning opportunities.
	Supportive work environment with creative freedom.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to:&nbsp;darinze@tvdeluxeglobal.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
